sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO DIVISION (DIVISION_ID , DIVISION_NAME, DIVISION_STATUS) VALUES (#divisionId#, #divisionName#, #divisionStatus#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE DIVISION SET DIVISION_NAME=#divisionName#, DIVISION_STATUS=#divisionStatus# WHERE DIVISION_ID=#divisionId#
sqlMap.delete: UPDATE DIVISION SET DIVISION_STATUS=0 WHERE DIVISION_ID=#id#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DIVISION_ID AS divisionId, DIVISION_NAME AS divisionName, DIVISION_STATUS AS divisionStatus FROM DIVISION WHERE DIVISION_ID=#id#
